description: The musician talks about his upcoming album and video game.
title: Okkervil River's Will Sheff on tech and nostalgia
contentencoded:
Will Sheff, of Okkervil River, talks to Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson about the band’s new album, Silver Gymnasium, and the companion videogame that taps into 80s nostalgia. 

Click the audio player above to hear the extended interview.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, September 5, 2013
